channel.title: Full Construction?
channel.description:

This is pretty cool! I am surprised how well this turned out on the server.

item.title: Full Construction?
item.dc:creator: @sinisoul sini
item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

Well IIRC, you copy the rooms but you have to know the placement of where each object in the room is. You could probably sweep each room and build a composite of what can/cannot be replaced via the options of the objects in the room. Then from there the rotations are pretty simple since thats just changing a literal bit in the dynamic region packet. You’d have to save the room configuration, each room would represent an id on a plane then each object is on a plane within the room.

12k lines of code sounds really extreme.

Read full topic
